title: Fiora a carried a competitive game
body:
Can we stop crying about a lack of diversity now?

I think i've seen more champions this season than in all of season 4, and we aren't even half way through. 

lol

replies.body:
Fiora was against what?
If it was against Hecarim, Irelia, Fizz or Sion, she shouldn't be able to win.

This is where it gets funny.

The toplane matchup was Irelia vs Fiora

They lane swapped. Lucian went top, Irelia and the support went bot

Fiora got first blood at 5 minutes.

:')

Edit: What the team with Fiora did, was force Lucian to go into a shitty matchup bot, or go top. They chose top, and fed fiora, so basically, they used lane bullies properly, unlike most teams these days xD
Sorry, doesn't count, not real LCS.

I smell a plebian

It always smells like plebian when you show up ;-;
I hate how satire translates so poorly on the internet.
You gotta say Kappa or Dank Memes come on man 8)

There's more diversity the higher you go in rank.

When I play on my level 19 smurf, everyone rages when there's a non-meta pick. Heck, I have seen people going afk for not wanting to play with "that troll Annie/Nautilus support".

Still no diversity in my bronze/silver scrub rank

All i see is katarina and yi, pls fix gaem 4 divurzity.
yi 2 op pls nerf solo'd my tueet with ap rens
gee gee js delte yi frum game rito ur bad at blancing wy dunt u evr buff me mane
